water-gun.name: Water Gun
water-gun.PTEXT: The Player shot water at the opponent.
water-gun.ETEXT: The opponent shot water at the player.

vine-whip.name: Vine Whip
vine-whip.PTEXT: The Player whipped the opponent with vines.
vine-whip.ETEXT: The opponent whipped the player with vines.

thundershock.name: Thunder Shock
thundershock.PTEXT: The Player shocked the opponent with electricity.
thundershock.ETEXT: The opponent shocked the player with electricity.

quick-attack.name: Quick Attack
quick-attack.PTEXT: The Player attacked the opponent quickly.
quick-attack.ETEXT: The opponent attacked the player quickly.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.PTEXT: The Player used Psychic on the opponent.
psychic.ETEXT: The opponent used Psychic on the Player.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.PTEXT: The Player shot a Thunderbolt at the opponent.
thunderbolt.ETEXT: The opponent shot a Thunderbolt at the Player
